metadata.title: USN-7085-2 -- X.Org X Server vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-7085-1 fixed a vulnerability in X.Org. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   Jan-Niklas Sohn discovered that the X.Org X Server incorrectly handled  certain memory operations in the X Keyboard Extension. An attacker could  use this issue to cause the X Server to crash, leading to a denial of  service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7085-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xdmx - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xdmx-tools - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xnest - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xorg-server-source - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-common - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-xephyr - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-xorg-dev - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xvfb - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 xwayland - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15+esm9 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro  xorg-server-source-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 xserver-xephyr-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 xserver-xorg-core-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 xserver-xorg-dev-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 xserver-xorg-legacy-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 xwayland-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
